description:
Pledge Coin (PLG) is a cryptocurrency token that operates on the Ethereum platform. Pledgecamp is a next generation crowdfunding platform that uses smart escrow contracts in efforts to keep investors protected and project creators accountable. According to the team, the project is reportedly backed by Randi Zuckerberg, Matt Curcio (VP of Data, Ripple), David Ambroz (Executive Director, Disney TV Group), Keith Teare (Founding Shareholder, TechCrunch), and more.
